page.title: 07Local News 3rd May 1985
page.content: On the 3rd May 1985 we cut some news strips out of the{Rotherham Advertizer about our 'D' block. At Ravenfield church a{comfirmation service}will be held in September at 10am. Ravenfield church has just started a{Mother and {Toddler club}and they have coffee afternoons to raise funds for the club.The morning service will not be held in St James church but will be held at the Parish Hall, Birchwood Drive.The people of Bramley and Ravenfield churches will be going to the{"Billy Graham Crusade"}at Bramall Lane Sheffield. The Public house called the{"Cavalier"}sponsors a{football {team}and they beat the{Maltby Miners {Welfare juniors 4-0}and won the {Rotherham Centenary League Cup.
